scripts.start: cd .. && UI_MODE=AWX BRAND='Red Hat' PRODUCT='Ansible Automation Platform' AWX_API_PREFIX='/api/controller/v2' HUB_API_PREFIX='/api/hub' webpack serve --mode development --config ./platform/webpack.platform.cjs --port 4100 --open
scripts.build: cd .. && npm run clean && UI_MODE=AWX BRAND='Red Hat' PRODUCT='Ansible Automation Platform' AWX_API_PREFIX='/api/controller/v2' HUB_API_PREFIX='/api/hub' webpack --mode production --config ./platform/webpack.platform.cjs --output-path build/platform
scripts.docker:build: cd .. && docker build --file platform/Dockerfile --target platform-ui --tag platform-ui .
scripts.docker:run: echo https://localhost:4100 && docker run --name platform-ui --rm -p 4100:443 -e PLATFORM_SERVER=$PLATFORM_SERVER platform-ui
